name: NETSUITE_INBOUND_EVENT_ERROR
data:
salesrep,Invalid Sales Rep
Please choose an item to add,Invalid SKU
You have entered an Invalid Field Value -1 for the following field: price,Invalid Price
customer.netsuiteId,Invalid Customer
You must enter at least one line item for this transaction.,Missing Items on SO
salesRep.netsuiteId,Invalid Sales Rep
The field addressee contained more than the maximum number ( 100 ) of characters allowed.,Addressee too long
custbodyr7idrrep,Invalid IDR Rep
custbody_tt_billing_contact,Invalid Billing Contact
null,Unexpected Error
The field addr1 contained more than the maximum number ( 150 ) of characters allowed.,Too many characters in a field
The total amount is too large. Please split the transaction into multiple ones.,Transaction too large
The total can not be negative.,Total is negative
